title: Happiness Awaits You!
description: 68 true stories, written by 44 authors who have overcome adversity or found hope by exploring the mystical aspects of life, have been gathered to help readers find the peace and contentment. A diverse blend of people share their personal journeys to happiness, including well-known names such as-Susan Jeffers Ph.D, M.J. Ryan,Antonio Ballatore, Dee Wallace, Barry Goldstein, and Barbara Shiffman. Each chapter ends with advice and activities for personal growth. Happiness Awaits You! began with one woman's desire to bring more happiness into the world.
author: Carol Costa
